review: Missed out on the introductory price by one day when they first offered Fire TV stick for $19 and am kicking myself now because it is very good product for the money.  I always heard my friends tout their RoKu and since I had an amazon prime account figured I would give this a shot since it said it had more choices than Roku.  I have been very pleased at the ease of use and choices that are on my fire tv stick.  I really like the fact that I can use it on our outdoor patio or in the living room or anywhere else so easily by just plugging and playing.  The extra $20 bucks I spent to get this was worth it.  all my prime music and movies Netflixs kids stuff like pbs kids and Disney is great to entertain the kids for a while.
